name: Broccoli Gratin
author: BethanyC
summary: Made this last night for the first time... I think even people who hate broccoli will love this! So simple, I recommend trying any kind of veggie or cheese combo.
ingredients: 1 large head broccoli, cut into florets
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add broccoli, cover, and steam until tender, 3 to 5 minutes
Melt 5 tablespoons butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat
Add flour, stirring constantly to prevent browning
Slowly pour in milk, stirring constantly
Remove from heat; stir in Cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and onion powder
Drain broccoli and place in a casserole dish
Bake in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes
Saute in a skillet with the remaining 1 tablespoon butter until golden, 2 to 3 minutes
Spread bread crumbs over the broccoli and continue baking until golden brown, about 5 minutes more
